R

reduceHealth(int) - Method in class entities.Player
Reduces the player's health by a specified amount and plays a hurt sound, implementing a cooldown between damages.
removeListener() - Method in class entities.Ghost
Removes the attached step listener from the ghost, ceasing its dynamic interactions with the game world and the player.
restartGame() - Method in class levels.GameLevel
Restarts the game level by resetting the player and all level components to their initial state.
rightBoundary - Variable in class objects.MovingGround
 
RUN_LEFT - Static variable in class entities.Player
 
RUN_RIGHT - Static variable in class entities.Player
 
runLeft() - Method in class entities.Player
Causes the player to run to the left, changing the player's visual representation to a running animation facing left.
runRight() - Method in class entities.Player
Causes the player to run to the right, changing the player's visual representation to a running animation facing right.
